in/PUBLIC/schemes_ShowSchemesH. aspx? schid=104"}], "schemeImageUrl": "", "detailedDescription_md": "The scheme ‘Maintenance of Horti Hubs” was launched by the Department of Agriculture &amp; Farmers’ Welfare, Government of Meghalaya to procure good quality disease-free and commercially accepted varieties of the identified flowers &amp; multiply and to serve as a demonstration cum training ground for those who are interested in Floriculture and who intend to make this as their means of livelihood. 
", "benefits_md": "> **Pattern of Assistance:**

Organizing demonstration cum training on hi-tech floriculture for farmers who are interested in floriculture, and renovation/repairing of old hubs.
